elements.name: Name dem Aufgaben
elements.title: Make a note of your findings

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: I can do this if I disagree with an existing constitutional article:
elements.correctAnswer:
- Sign a popular initiative
- Collect signatures for a popular initiative
- Launch a popular initiative
- Vote in a constitutional amendment (based on a popular initiative or a mandatory referendum) in line with my interests
- Vote for politicians who represent my interests

elements.name: Frage 2
elements.title: This is how I can influence legislative articles:
elements.correctAnswer:
- Sign an optional referendum
- Collect signatures for an optional referendum
- Launch an optional referendum
- Vote according to my interests in a referendum concerning a change to the law
- Vote for politicians who represent my interests

elements.name: Frage 3
elements.title: That's why I have relatively little influence on regulations:
elements.correctAnswer: When regulations are changed or newly issued, the people never have a say (= no referendums).
